article_title: Republicans gather for Lincoln Day Dinner

article_metadata.description:
Republicans across the country have to be willing to fight for their beliefs and keep the faith with their fundamental principles, the chairman of the House Freedom Caucus told local members of the GOP on Friday night.
U.S. Rep. Jim Jordan, who is considered one of the most conservative members of Congress and a fiscal hawk, spoke at the Tazewell County GOP’s Lincoln Day Dinner at Embassy Suites in East Peoria, using quotes from the Bible and a Broadway musical to encourage his audience
article_metadata.author: Chris Kaergard GateHouse Media Illinois
